title: [Medicine] Study points to possible autoimmune cause for some cases of schizophrenia: a specific autoantibody was identified in about 6% of the tested schizophrenic patients, but not in any of the healthy controls; the autoantibody triggered schizophrenic symptoms when injected into mice
